description.value:
Whenever you witness a creature within 30 feet of you that is @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.conditions.ZOBZ8V2YME5YOYZR]{🦁 Lionized} fail an attack roll or check, you can use your reaction to make it roll again. On a success, it succeeds in its goal thanks to sheer luck, an improbable coincidence, or some other comically convoluted means.
    Once you cause a creature to succeed using this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a rest or unless you spend a @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.ZVH8L715PTWTQLSE]{✨ Flair} point as part of the reaction. The @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.ZVH8L715PTWTQLSE]{✨ Flair} point is refunded if the creature fails the reroll.

system.requirements: Must have the Bard Starter Abilities
